full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00360-LJL Document 106 Filed 12/28/20 Page 22 of 22 hearing to evaluate Maxwell's motion, and it declines to do so. See United States v. Raniere, No. 18-CR-2041 (NGG) (VMS), 2018 WL 6344202, at *2 n.7 (E.D.N.Y. Dec. 5, 2018). IV. Conclusion Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell's renewed motion for release on bail, Dkt. No. 97, is DENIED. SO ORDERED. Dated: December 28, 2020 New York, New York ALISON J. NATHAN United States District Judge

text_blocks.content: hearing to evaluate Maxwell's motion, and it declines to do so. See United States v. Raniere, No. 18-CR-2041 (NGG) (VMS), 2018 WL 6344202, at *2 n.7 (E.D.N.Y. Dec. 5, 2018).
Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell's renewed motion for release on bail, Dkt. No. 97, is DENIED.

additional_notes: The document is a court order denying Ghislaine Maxwell's motion for release on bail. It is signed by Judge Alison J. Nathan.
